original_text: Then the Lord said to Moses, ‘Pharaoh's mind is still hard. He refuses to let the people go.
korean_text: 여호와께서 모세에게 이르시되 바로의 마음이 완강하여 백성 보내기를 거절하는도다

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord said to Moses,
He refuses to let the people go.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 백성을 가게 내버려 두기를 거부합니다.
